products.description: Weighing just 73g, the KATAR PRO XT is extremely light and agile for hours of fast-paced FPS or MOBA gameplay.     The KATAR PRO XT’s compact, symmetric shape makes it great for claw and fingertip grip styles.     An 18,000 DPI optical sensor from PixArt, customizable in 1 DPI steps, offers the precision and high-accuracy tracking you need for victory.     CORSAIR QUICKSTRIKE buttons use a spring-loaded design, delivering zero gap between the left and right click buttons and their switches, so your clicks, shots, and spells are faster than ever.     A lightweight paracord cable reduces drag, enabling faster, tighter, and more precise mouse movements.

products.name: TECKNET Wireless Mouse, USB Cordless Computer Mouse with 8 Buttons, Ergonomic Design, High-Precision 5 Adjustable DPI for PC/Mac/Laptop
products.description: 【2.4GHz Wireless Gaming Mouse】Our 2.4GHz wireless gaming mouse offers a more secure and precise experience compared to traditional FM radio systems, with an increased working distance of up to 10 meters.     【Plug & Play】No need to install a driver; simply plug the tiny USB Nano receiver into your PC, and the mouse will automatically connect. You can select your preferred cursor speed from 800, 1200, 1600, 2400, or 4800 DPI.     【Secret Weapon for Gaming】With our wireless gaming mouse, achieve a 500Hz return rate for instant transmission between your computer and mouse. Experience no delay and no frame skipping, allowing you to enjoy games more fluently and freely.     【Stable Connection】The wireless gaming mouse features Tru-Wave and Co-Link Technology. Tru-Wave technology provides precise, smart cursor control over many surface types. Co-Link technology ensures that once paired, there is no need to re-establish the connection after a signal loss or shutdown.     【Energy Efficient】The auto power-off function switches off the wireless mouse when the USB Nano receiver is disconnected or when the PC is switched off. This feature provides up to 12 months of battery life from just 2 AA batteries (not included).     【36 Months Support】If you encounter any problems in using the computer mouse wireless, please feel free to contact our professional customer service team, enjoying TECKNET 36 Months Warranty (Registered Only)

details.detail_item: 【2.4GHz Wireless Gaming Mouse】Our 2.4GHz wireless gaming mouse offers a more secure and precise experience compared to traditional FM radio systems, with an increased working distance of up to 10 meters.

Users through the software to set the mouse buttons,DPl,mode,lighting effects,etc.SM600 Custom mouse greatly meets the DIY needs of game enthusiasts     Adjustable DPI and Rechargeable Battery:SM600 wireless mouse can be adjusted within 6 levels dpi(8000-4000-2400-1600-1200-800).Rate of return up to 1000Hz,even in intense games,achieve zero latency and no frame skipping. Built-in 600 mA lithium battery,with USB-C charqing cable,Low battery indicator will remind user to charge it with flashing redlight.it also supported recharged while charging     Lightweight and Honeycomb Shell:SM600 honeycomb mouse made of high quality.ABS material and designed with ergonomic hollow shell,Ergonomic Design reduce the weight and make the mouse more flexible and easier to be used for a long time without fatigue,and also enhance the heat dissipation features very comfortable to use.     14 RGB Rainbow Backlight:SM600 has beautiful RGB rainbow backlight.This wireless mouse is equipped with RGB lighting effects. Press the top button to switch light modes(rainbow light,Monochrome light,light off). Very cool lights especially when useing in the dark.

products.name: Wireless Gaming Mouse Honeycomb 2.4G USB Cordless Mouse RGB Rechargeable PC Game Mice with 7-Color LED Lights，3 Adjustable DPI for Windows Laptop Desktop Computers -White
products.description: 【LIGHTWEIGHT HONEYCOMB SHELL DESIGN】 The gaming mouse is made of high-quality ABS material and designed with an ergonomic hollow perforated housing, reducing weight and providing a comfortable grip even during long gaming sessions.     【WIRELESS FREEDOM & STABLE CONNECTION】 Connects wirelessly through 2.4G technology with the USB nano receiver, offering a stable connection with a range of up to 10m (33ft). No delays or dropouts, simply plug and play.     【VIBRANT RGB 7-COLOR BACKLIGHT】 The RGB gaming mouse features a flowing rainbow backlight that adds a visually stunning atmosphere to your workspace. Convenient switch to turn off the light when desired.     【3 DPI ADJUSTABLE & BATTERY RECHARGEABLE】 Adjust the mouse's DPI levels (1600-1200-800) for precise control. The built-in 600mAh lithium battery is rechargeable via USB-C cable, with a low battery indicator for timely charging.     【WIDE COMPATIBILITY】 Compatible with various devices such as PC, Mac Notebook, Laptop, Tablet, desktop, Computer, and more. Supports Windows 7/8/10/XP/VISTA/MAC OS, ensuring versatility.
